1 var PacketReader = require('../../PacketReader'),
  2   PacketWriter = require('../../PacketWriter'),
  3   ClientInfoExchange = require('../../ClientInfoExchangePacket'),
  4   assert = require('assert');
  5 
  6 function testClientInfoExchangePacket_01() {
  7   var packetReader = new PacketReader();
  8   var packetWriter = new PacketWriter();
  9   var clientInfoExchange = new ClientInfoExchange();
 10 
 11   clientInfoExchange.write(packetWriter);
 12   assert.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer().slice(0, 5), 'CUBRK');
 13   assert.equal(packetWriter._toBuffer()[5], 3);
 14 
 15   packetReader.write(new Buffer([0, 0, 1, 2])); //=258
 16   clientInfoExchange.parse(packetReader);
 17   assert.equal(clientInfoExchange.newConnectionPort, 258);
 18 }
 19 
 20 console.log('Unit test ' + module.filename.toString() + ' started...');
 21 
 22 testClientInfoExchangePacket_01();
 23 
 24 console.log('Unit test ended OK.');
 25 
 26
